Bash(python -c "
import httpx
import asyncio

async def main\(\):
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(\) as client:
        # Login
        resp = await client.post\(
            ''https://linkedin-replybot-jc-app-production.up.railway.app/api/auth/login'',
            json={''password'': ''5Hot5seeme!''}
        \)
        token = resp.json\(\)[''token'']
        print\(f''Token: {token[:20]}...''\)
        
        # Get accounts
        resp = await client.get\(
            ''https://linkedin-replybot-jc-app-production.up.railway.app/api/accounts'',
            headers={''Authorization'': f''Bearer {token}''}
        \)
        print\(resp.json\(\)\)

asyncio.run\(main\(\)\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import httpx
import asyncio

async def main\(\):
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(\) as client:
        # Login
        resp = await client.post\(
            ''https://linkedin-replybot-jc-app-production.up.railway.app/api/auth/login'',
            json={''password'': ''5Hot5seeme!''}
        \)
        token = resp.json\(\)[''token'']
        
        # Get posts
        resp = await client.get\(
            ''https://linkedin-replybot-jc-app-production.up.railway.app/api/reply-bot/posts'',
            headers={''Authorization'': f''Bearer {token}''}
        \)
        posts = resp.json\(\)
        print\(''Posts:''\)
        for post in posts:
            print\(f''  - {post.get\(""postTitle"", ""Untitled""\)} \(Account: {post.get\(""account"", {}\).get\(""name"", ""N/A""\)}\)''\)
            print\(f''    ID Token: {post.get\(""account"", {}\).get\(""identificationToken"", ""N/A""\)[:30]}...''\)
            print\(f''    Post URL: {post.get\(""postUrl"", ""N/A""\)}''\)

asyncio.run\(main\(\)\)
")
